The email with the activation link has b: The email with the activation link has been sent successfully.

If you don't want to change your passwor: If you don't want to change your password, just ignore this message.
Please enter your email address below. W: Please enter your email address below. We will send you an email with the link to reset your password.
Clicking on this button pushes all the c: Clicking on this button pushes all the changes to production. It won’t be possible to discard changes after publishing it.
Clicking on this button will open your w: Clicking on this button will open your website in the same browser window. You’ll be able to test your tags - even those that haven’t been published yet.
Clicking on this button discards all the: Clicking on this button discards all the changes that have been made in the current draft version and reverts back to the last published version.
Every container has a unique ID which is: Every container has a unique ID which is inserted into the snippet code.
A list of all the triggers added to a ta: A list of all the triggers added to a tag.
A Trigger specifies how and when the tag: A Trigger specifies how and when the tag should fire.
E.g. “Page view” should fire when a page: E.g. “Page view” should fire when a page loads according to the set conditions
The number of tags where the trigger is: The number of tags where the trigger is being used.
Paste your tag’s HTML code (snippet) her: Paste your tag’s HTML code (snippet) here. You don’t need to put it directly into your website’s code anymore. Just set it here.
Choose or create a new trigger(s) to spe: Choose or create a new trigger(s) to specify how and when you want to fire the tag.
- Page view - fire the tag when the page: - Page view - fire the tag when the page loads according to the set conditions.
- Click - fire the tag when a user click: - Click - fire the tag when a user clicks on a page according to the set conditions.
- Event - fire the tag on a specific eve: - Event - fire the tag on a specific event(s) according to the set conditions.
- Form submission - fire the tag when a: - Form submission - fire the tag when a user submits a form according to the set conditions.
Add a condition(s) for firing your tag(s: Add a condition(s) for firing your tag(s). You can add extra rules like firing on certain pages, clicking on a defined element, and many more.
A tag is a snippet of JavaScript that se: A tag is a snippet of JavaScript that sends information to a third party. You don't need to add your tags directly to your website, just specify how and when the tags should fire.
Create a container and manage all your t: Create a container and manage all your tags here. Just paste the Container code into your website’s code, set the triggers, and save your time.
One trigger can be assigned to many tags: One trigger can be assigned to many tags.
Invalid value. Please enter a number.
Invalid value. Please enter a positive n: Invalid value. Please enter a positive number.
Copy the code and paste it into your web: Copy the code and paste it into your website's code. You can also do it later.
Create a trigger and link it with the ta: Create a trigger and link it with the tag to fire it on your website.
and link it with the tag to fire it on y: and link it with the tag to fire it on your website.
Container code is a snippet which helps: Container code is a snippet which helps you to fire all your tags on your website. Paste the Container code into your website’s code (in between the <body> </body> element of all your pages). We recommend you embed the code right under the <body> element.

Container code is a snippet which helps you to fire all your tags on your website. Paste the Container code into your website’s code (in between the <head> </head> element of all your pages). Please notice embed the code under the <body> element may causes performance problems.

Note that all application administrators: Note that all application administrators has an owner role in all containers.

Property is used to slow down actions (e: Property is used to slow down actions (e.g. redirect) when waiting for tags to be resolved.

A list of all the tags that have been fi: A list of all the tags that have been fired on this page.
A list of all the tags that could be fir: A list of all the tags that could be fired on this page if the triggers were met.
None of the tags has been triggered: None of the tags has been triggered
A list of all the tags which will be fir: A list of all the tags which will be fired in published container.
Do not fire in a debug mode: Do not fire in a debug mode

Send an email with the activation link: Send an email with the activation link
Set priority if you want to fire tags in: Set priority if you want to fire tags in a specific order. By default, tags are fired in any order.
Please note – The bigger the value, the: Please note – The bigger the value, the higher the priority. Tags are always fired asynchronously.
Clicking on this button pushes all the c: Clicking on this button pushes all the changes to production. It won’t be possible to discard changes after publishing it.

Note that all application administrators: Note that all application administrators has owner role in all containers.
A list of all the tags that will be fire: A list of all the tags that will be fired in published container.

Send email with activation link: Send an email with the activation link

Form is invalid. Please correct selected: Form is invalid. Please correct selected fields
Login or password is incorrect. Please t: Login or password is incorrect. Please try again.
User with passed email address does not: User with passed email address does not exist.
Sorry, something went wrong. Try to rese: Sorry, something went wrong. Try to reset your password one more time.
Both password fields requires at least 8: Both password fields requires at least 8 characters.
First password field requires at least 8: First password field requires at least 8 characters.
Second password field requires at least: Second password field requires at least 8 characters.
You are trying to close unsaved trigger.
Password needs to have minimum 8 charact: Password needs to have minimum 8 characters
User account has been saved successfully: User account has been saved successfully.
Your password has been changed successfu: Your password has been changed successfully.
Email with activation link has been sent: An email with the activation link has been sent.
Choose or create a new variable(s) for c: Choose or create a new variable(s) for conditions or use them in your tag template.
A variable store data from your browser: A variable store data from your browser to use it in several places e.g. resolving triggers
Tags with status inactive will be not fi: Tags with status inactive will be not fired after publication.
This functionality allows you avoid crea: This functionality allows you avoid creating tags manually for well-known tags types like Piwik, Google Adwords etc. Custom tag templates engine just replace values from form and pass them to apropriate places in tag templates code.
Please enter URLs of your website(s), on: Please enter URLs of your website(s), on which you implemented the container. You can also select the way in which the debug URL parameter is appended - through hash or as parameter.
Tag status was changed successfully: Tag status has been changed successfully
Container has been published! Changes ar: Container has been published! Changes are now live!
Option to break forwarding of links. Imp: Option to break forwarding of links. Important when debug external or internal links
Open your website in Preview and debug m: Open your website in Preview and debug mode:
Shows shortcuts to all websites this con: Shows shortcuts to all websites this container is used on.
This email address has been used previou: This email address has been used previously before
With breakpoints You can stop the page c: With breakpoints You can stop the page change events from execution. This makes it easier to check if proper tags were triggered e.g. during form submission
You can use previously defined variables: You can use previously defined variables in the tag code. Simply choose one from the list.
URI that should be used on page view eve: URI that should be used on page view event if NoScript is enabled
The URL needs to start with http:// or h: The URL needs to start with http:// or https:// protocol definition.You can also use protocol-relative statement if you do not want to specify protocol.
During tag edition in \"Advanced setting: During tag edition in "Advanced settings" section you can specify, if the tag should be turned off. Just select "Respect visitors privacy".
Embedding the Opt-out snippet in your we: Embedding the Opt-out snippet in your website(s) html markup helps you to respect visitors privacy.
To ensure correct behavior, remember to: To ensure correct behavior, remember to put it inside your page <body>.
Please be aware the user-facing message: Please be aware the user-facing message generated by the opt-out code will be displayed in English.
This tag is marked as \"Tracking tag\" b: This tag is marked as "Tracking tag" because you have selected the "respect visitors privacy" option.
This tag won`t be resolved when your vis: This tag won`t be resolved when your visitors:
- select the Do Not Track option in thei: - select the Do Not Track option in their web browser
- explicitly opt out from being tracked: - explicitly opt out from being tracked (go to "7tag options" → "Opt-out message generator" to learn more about the opt-out feature).
Check this checkbox if you want to mark: Check this checkbox if you want to mark this tag as a "Tracking tag" and you want to respect your visitors’ privacy preferences either expressed by:
- selecting the Do Not Track option in t: - selecting the Do Not Track option in their web browser.
- explicitly opting out from being track: - explicitly opting out from being tracked. Go to "7tag options" → "Opt-out message generator" to learn more about the opt-out feature.
Choose the precise moment when the tag s: Choose the precise moment when the tag should be fired. Available options:
- DOM ready - when the HTML document was: - DOM ready - when the HTML document was parsed.
- Page load - when all resources (e.g. i: - Page load - when all resources (e.g. images) are downloaded.
- Page view - when the container is read: - Page view - when the container is ready to handle all tags.
There are two types of tags:: There are two types of tags:
- asynchronous - fired based on choosen: - asynchronous - fired based on choosen triggers
- synchronous - fired and resolved first: - synchronous - fired and resolved first, even before the page is loaded
Please remember to embed container code: Please remember to embed container code dedicated for synchronous tags. To find the code, go to container's options.
This trigger is linked to at least one s: This trigger is linked to at least one synchronous tag. To change trigger type, unlink the trigger from synchronous tags.
Please note, synchronous tags are compat: Please note, synchronous tags are compatible only with triggers of "Page view" type.
Triggers of other types will not be disp: Triggers of other types will not be displayed here.
At least one of the added triggers has d: At least one of the added triggers has different type then "Page View". Synchronous tags can only use triggers of "Page View" type.
Synchronous tags are compatible only wit: Synchronous tags are compatible only with triggers of "Page view" type. You are not able to choose firing synchronous tags on "Click", "Sending form" or "Event".
Asynchronous tags may fire and be resolv: Asynchronous tags may fire and be resolved after loading the page`s content. It`s good practice to use asynchronous tags for tracking tags.
Synchronous tags fire and load first - e: Synchronous tags fire and load first - even before the page loads. The content of page won`t appear until the tag fires. It`s good practice to use synchronous tags for A/B tests.
Avoid creating tags manually for well-kn: Avoid creating tags manually for well-known tags types like Piwik, Google Adwords etc. Custom tag templates engine just replaces values from form and passes them to appropriate places in tag template code.
This feature is transparent for synchron: This feature is transparent for synchronous tags.
Currently, you are the only user in appl: Currently, you are the only user in application.
This is not a tracking tag, therefore th: This is not a tracking tag, therefore this option is disabled.
Embedding the Opt-out snippet in your we: Embedding the Opt-out snippet in your website’s HTML helps you to respect your visitors' privacy.
There are two types of the Opt-out snipp: There are two types of the Opt-out snippet:
Domain - if you assign the “Opt-out” to: Domain - if you assign the “Opt-out” to a domain, it will turn off all tracking tags within that domain.
Global - if you choose “global Opt out“,: Global - if you choose “global Opt out“,  then it will turn off all tracking tags in all your containers within your current 7tag instance (this will apply to all containers - even those created after generating the opt-out code).
Sorry, there is no such object on the li: Sorry, there is no such object on the list
